events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the refund process for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. I attached a photo of the item showing that it is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for providing the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate the refund being processed quickly.
The refund has been initiated and the case is now considered resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund. Please contact us if there are any issues.
The support case is now officially closed. Thank you for contacting us, and have a great day!
